thread.title: Noble Energy, Israel’s Delek to Supply Gas to Egypt in $15 Billion Deal

author: Rory Jones
title: Noble Energy, Israel’s Delek to Supply Gas to Egypt in $15 Billion Deal
text:
Investors in Israel’s natural-gas fields agreed Monday to supply an Egyptian company with gas valued at $15 billion, a deal that will build on growing ties between once-hostile neighbors that now share a common enemy in the restive the Sinai Peninsula.
Houston’s Noble Energy Inc. and Israel-based Delek Drilling-LP will supply 64 billion cubic meters of natural gas over 10 years from the Tamar and Leviathan fields to Egypt’s Dolphinus Holdings Ltd., Delek said in a statement.
